00028 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR 
00029 
00054 
00055 RandomSearch::RandomSearch(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00056 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00057 {   
00058    // Multilayer perceptron
00059 
00060    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00061 
00062    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00063 
00064    // Init minimum value of free parameters to -1
00065 
00066    Vector<double> newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters, -1.0);
00067 
00068    minimumValueOfFreeParameters = newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters;
00069 
00070    // Init maximum value of free parameters to +1
00071 
00072    Vector<double> newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters, 1.0);
00073 
00074    maximumValueOfFreeParameters = newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters;    
00075    
00076    // Stopping criteria
00077 
00078    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00079    maximumTime = 1.0e6;
00080    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100; 
00081    
00082    // User stuff
00083    
00084    displayPeriod = 100;
00085 }
00086

00149 // Matrix<double> getMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(void) method
00150 
00158 
00159 Matrix<double> RandomSearch::getMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(void)
00160 {
00161    // Multilayer perceptron
00162 
00163    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00164 
00165    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00166 
00167    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(2, numberOfFreeParameters);
00168 
00169    minimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.setRow(0, minimumValueOfFreeParameters); 
00170    minimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.setRow(1, maximumValueOfFreeParameters); 
00171 
00172    return(minimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters);
00173 }

00176 // void setMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method
00177 
00181 
00182 void RandomSearch::setMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double> newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters)
00183 {
00184    // Control sentence (if debug)
00185 
00186    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00187 
00188    int size = newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters.getSize();
00189 
00190    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00191 
00192    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00193 
00194    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters) 
00195    {
00196       std::cerr << std::endl
00197                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl 
00198                 << "void setMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00199                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00200                 << std::endl;
00201 
00202       exit(1);
00203    }
00204 
00205    // Check that minimum value of free parameters is not greater than their maximum value
00206       
00207    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00208    {
00209       if(newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters[i] > maximumValueOfFreeParameters[i])
00210       {
00211          std::cerr << std::endl
00212                    << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00213                    << "void setMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00214                    << "Minimum value of free parameter " << i 
00215                    << " is greater than maximum value of that parameter." << std::endl 
00216                    << std::endl;
00217 
00218          exit(1);
00219       }
00220    }
00221 
00222    #endif
00223 
00224    // Set minimum value of free parameters
00225 
00226    minimumValueOfFreeParameters = newMinimumValueOfFreeParameters;
00227 }

00230 // void setMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method
00231 
00235 
00236 void RandomSearch::setMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double> newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters)
00237 {
00238    // Control sentence (if debug)
00239 
00240    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00241 
00242    int size = newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters.getSize();
00243 
00244    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00245 
00246    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00247 
00248    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters) 
00249    {
00250       std::cerr << std::endl
00251                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl 
00252                 << "void setMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00253                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00254                 << std::endl;
00255 
00256       exit(1);
00257    }
00258    
00259    // Check that maximum value of free parameters is not less than their minimum value
00260       
00261    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00262    {
00263       if(newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters[i] < minimumValueOfFreeParameters[i])
00264       {
00265          std::cerr << std::endl
00266                    << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00267                    << "void setMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00268                    << "Maximum value of free parameter " << i 
00269                    << " is less than minimum value of that parameter." << std::endl 
00270                    << std::endl;
00271 
00272          exit(1);
00273       }
00274    }
00275 
00276    #endif
00277 
00278    // Set maximum value of free parameters
00279 
00280    maximumValueOfFreeParameters = newMaximumValueOfFreeParameters;
00281 }

00284 // void setMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(Matrix<double>) method
00285 
00296 
00297 void RandomSearch
00298 ::setMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(Matrix<double> newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters)
00299 {
00300    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00301 
00302    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00303 
00304    // Control sentence (if debug)
00305 
00306    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00307 
00308    int numberOfRows = newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.getNumberOfRows();
00309    int numberOfColumns = newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.getNumberOfColumns();
00310 
00311 
00312    if(numberOfRows != 2 || numberOfColumns != numberOfFreeParameters) 
00313    {
00314       std::cerr << std::endl
00315                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00316                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
00317                 << "Number of rows must be two and number of columns must be equal to "
00318                 << "number of free parameters." << std::endl
00319                 << std::endl;
00320 
00321       exit(1);
00322    }
00323 
00324    #endif
00325 
00326    minimumValueOfFreeParameters = newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.getRow(0);
00327    maximumValueOfFreeParameters = newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters.getRow(1);
00328    
00329    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00330    {
00331       if(minimumValueOfFreeParameters[i] > maximumValueOfFreeParameters[i])
00332       {
00333          std::cout << std::endl
00334                    << "Flood Error RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00335                    << "void setMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
00336                    << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
00337                    << std::endl;
00338 
00339          exit(1);
00340       }
00341    }   
00342 }

00345 // void setReserveAllTrainingHistory(bool) method
00346 
00351 
00352 void RandomSearch::setReserveAllTrainingHistory(bool newReserveAllTrainingHistory)
00353 {
00354    reserveElapsedTimeHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00355    reserveFreeParametersHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00356    reserveFreeParametersNormHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00357    reserveEvaluationHistory = newReserveAllTrainingHistory;
00358 }

00360 
00361 // void train(void) method
00362 
00366 
00367 void RandomSearch::train(void)
00368 {
00369    // Control sentence (if debug)
00370 
00371    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00372 
00373    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
00374    {
00375       std::cerr << std::endl
00376                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00377                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
00378                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00379                 << std::endl;
00380 
00381       exit(1);
00382    }
00383 
00384    #endif
00385 
00386    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
00387    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
00388 
00389    // Set beginning training time 
00390 
00391    time(&beginningTime);
00392 
00393    if(display)
00394    {
00395       std::cout << std::endl
00396                 << "Training with random search..." 
00397                 << std::endl;
00398    }
00399 
00400    // Multilayer perceptron stuff
00401 
00402    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00403 
00404    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00405 
00406    // Resize training history
00407 
00408    resizeTrainingHistory(1+maximumNumberOfEpochs);
00409 
00410    Vector<double> freeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00411 
00412    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
00413    {
00414       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);                                
00415    }
00416 
00417    double freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
00418 
00419    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
00420    {
00421       freeParametersNormHistory[0] = freeParametersNorm; 
00422    }
00423 
00424    if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
00425    {
00426       std::cout << std::endl
00427                 << "Flood Warning: Initial free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
00428    }
00429 
00430    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00431 
00432    double potentialFreeParametersNorm = 0.0;
00433 
00434    double potentialEvaluation = 0.0;
00435 
00436    // Initial evaluation
00437    
00438    double evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
00439 
00440    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00441    {
00442       evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation;
00443    }
00444 
00445    // Elapsed time
00446 
00447    time(&currentTime);
00448    elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
00449 
00450    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
00451    {
00452       elapsedTimeHistory[0] = elapsedTime;                             
00453    }
00454 
00455    if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
00456    {          
00457       if(display)
00458       {
00459          std::cout << std::endl
00460                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl;
00461 
00462          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00463          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00464          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;          
00465 
00466          objectiveFunctional->print();
00467       }
00468       
00469       // Resize training history
00470 
00471       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
00472 
00473       return;
00474    }
00475    else
00476    {
00477       if(display)
00478       {
00479          std::cout << "Initial elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00480          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00481          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " <<  evaluation << std::endl;
00482 
00483          objectiveFunctional->print();
00484       }
00485    }
00486 
00487    // Main loop
00488 
00489    for(int epoch = 1; epoch <= maximumNumberOfEpochs; epoch++)
00490    {
00491       // Free parameters           
00492            
00493       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00494       {
00495          double random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
00496 
00497          potentialFreeParameters[i] = minimumValueOfFreeParameters[i] 
00498          + (maximumValueOfFreeParameters[i]- minimumValueOfFreeParameters[i])*random;
00499       }
00500 
00501       if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
00502       {
00503          freeParametersHistory.setRow(epoch, potentialFreeParameters);                                
00504       }  
00505 
00506       // Free parameters norm
00507       
00508       potentialFreeParametersNorm = potentialFreeParameters.calculateNorm();
00509       
00510       if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
00511       {
00512          freeParametersNormHistory[epoch] = potentialFreeParametersNorm;
00513       }  
00514       
00515       // Evaluation
00516 
00517       potentialEvaluation 
00518       = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00519 
00520       if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00521       {
00522          evaluationHistory[epoch] = potentialEvaluation;                            
00523       }
00524 
00525       // Elapsed time
00526 
00527       time(&currentTime);
00528       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
00529     
00530       if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
00531       {
00532          elapsedTimeHistory[epoch] = elapsedTime;                             
00533       }
00534 
00535       // Check for evaluation improvement
00536 
00537       if(potentialEvaluation < evaluation)
00538       {
00539          evaluation = potentialEvaluation;
00540 
00541          multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(potentialFreeParameters);
00542          
00543          freeParametersNorm = potentialFreeParameters.calculateNorm();
00544       }
00545 
00546       // Stopping Criteria
00547 
00548       // Evaluation goal 
00549 
00550       if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
00551       {
00552          if(display)
00553          {
00554             std::cout << std::endl
00555                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
00556                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
00557 
00558             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00559             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00560             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00561 
00562             objectiveFunctional->print();
00563          }
00564 
00565          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
00566          
00567          break;
00568       }
00569 
00570       // Maximum optimization time
00571 
00572       if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
00573       {
00574          if(display)
00575          {
00576             std::cout << std::endl << "Epoch " << epoch << "Maximum training time reached." << std::endl;
00577 
00578             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00579             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00580             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00581 
00582             objectiveFunctional->print();
00583          }
00584 
00585          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
00586   
00587          break;
00588       }
00589 
00590       // Maximum number of epochs
00591 
00592       if(epoch == maximumNumberOfEpochs)
00593       {
00594          if(display)
00595          {
00596             std::cout << std::endl
00597                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": Maximum number of epochs reached." << std::endl;
00598 
00599             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00600             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00601             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00602 
00603             objectiveFunctional->print();
00604          }
00605 
00606          break;
00607       }
00608 
00609       // Progress
00610 
00611       if(display && epoch % displayPeriod == 0)
00612       {
00613          std::cout << std::endl
00614                    << "Epoch " << epoch << ";" << std::endl;
00615 
00616          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
00617          std::cout << "Free parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
00618          std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00619          
00620          objectiveFunctional->print();
00621       }
00622    }
00623 }

00627 
00649 
00650 void RandomSearch::print(void)
00651 {
00652    // Multilayer perceptron
00653 
00654    std::cout << std::endl
00655              << "Random Search Training Algorithm Object." << std::endl;
00656 
00657    // Training parameters
00658 
00659    // Minimum value of free parameters
00660    
00661    std::cout << "Minimum value of free parameters:" << std::endl 
00662              << minimumValueOfFreeParameters << std::endl;
00663 
00664    // Maximum value of free parameters
00665    
00666    std::cout << "Maximum value of free parameters:" << std::endl
00667              << maximumValueOfFreeParameters << std::endl;
00668    
00669    // Stopping criteria
00670 
00671    std::cout << "Evaluation goal: " << std::endl
00672              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
00673              << "Maximum time: " << std::endl
00674              << maximumTime << std::endl 
00675              << "Maximum number of epochs: " << std::endl
00676              << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl; 
00677 
00678    // User stuff
00679 
00680    std::cout << "Display: " << std::endl
00681              << display << std::endl
00682              << "Display period: " << std::endl
00683              << displayPeriod << std::endl;
00684 }

00689 
00714 
00715 void RandomSearch::save(char* filename)
00716 {
00717    // File
00718 
00719    std::fstream file;
00720 
00721    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00722 
00723    if(!file.is_open())
00724    {
00725       std::cerr << std::endl 
00726                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00727                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
00728                 << "Cannot open random search object data file."  << std::endl
00729                 << std::endl;
00730 
00731       exit(1);
00732    }
00733    else
00734    {
00735       if(display)
00736       {
00737          std::cout << std::endl
00738                    << "Saving random search object to data file..." << std::endl;
00739       }
00740    }
00741 
00742    // Write file header
00743 
00744    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Random Seach Object." << std::endl;
00745 
00746    // Training parameters
00747 
00748    // Minimum value of free parameters
00749    
00750    file << "MinimumValueOfFreeParameters: " << std::endl
00751         << minimumValueOfFreeParameters << std::endl;
00752 
00753    // Maximum value of free parameters
00754    
00755    file << "MaximumValueOfFreeParameters: " << std::endl
00756         << maximumValueOfFreeParameters << std::endl;
00757 
00758    // Stopping criteria
00759 
00760    file << "EvaluationGoal:" << std::endl
00761         << evaluationGoal << std::endl
00762         << "MaximumTime: " << std::endl
00763         << maximumTime << std::endl
00764         << "MaximumNumberOfEpochs: " << std::endl
00765         << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl;
00766 
00767    // User stuff
00768 
00769    file << "Display: " << std::endl
00770         << display << std::endl
00771         << "DisplayPeriod: " << std::endl
00772         << displayPeriod << std::endl;
00773 
00774    file.close();
00775 }

00778 // void load(char*) method
00779 
00805 
00806 void RandomSearch::load(char* filename)
00807 {
00808    // File
00809 
00810    std::fstream file;
00811 
00812    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
00813 
00814    if(!file.is_open())
00815    {
00816       std::cerr << std::endl
00817                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00818                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
00819                 << "Cannot open random search object data file."  << std::endl;
00820 
00821       exit(1);
00822    }
00823    else
00824    {
00825       if(display)
00826       {
00827          std::cout << std::endl
00828                    << "Loading random seach object from data file..."  << std::endl;
00829       }
00830    }
00831 
00832    std::string word;
00833 
00834    // Training parameters
00835 
00836    // Minimum value of free parameters
00837 
00838    while(word != "MinimumValueOfFreeParameters:")
00839    {
00840       file >> word;
00841    }
00842 
00843    file >> minimumValueOfFreeParameters;
00844 
00845    // Maximum value of free parameters
00846 
00847    file >> word;
00848 
00849    file >> maximumValueOfFreeParameters;
00850 
00851    // Stopping criteria: 
00852 
00853    // Evalaution goal
00854 
00855    file >> word;
00856 
00857    file >> evaluationGoal;
00858 
00859    // Maximum time
00860 
00861    file >> word;
00862 
00863    file >> maximumTime;
00864 
00865    // Maximum number of epochs
00866 
00867    file >> word;
00868 
00869    file >> maximumNumberOfEpochs;
00870 
00871    // User stuff: 
00872 
00873    // Display
00874 
00875    file >> word;
00876 
00877    file >> display;
00878 
00879    // Display period
00880 
00881    file >> word;
00882 
00883    file >> displayPeriod;
00884 
00885    // Close file
00886 
00887    file.close();
00888 }

00890 
00891 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
00892 
00904 
00905 void RandomSearch::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
00906 {
00907    // Free parameters history matrix
00908 
00909    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
00910    {
00911       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00912                                         
00913       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00914                                    
00915       freeParametersHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
00916    }
00917 
00918    // Free parameters norm history vector
00919 
00920    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
00921    {
00922       freeParametersNormHistory.resize(newSize);
00923    }
00924 
00925    // Evaluation history vector
00926 
00927    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00928    {
00929       evaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
00930    }
00931 
00932    // Elapsed time history vector
00933 
00934    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
00935    {
00936       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
00937    }
00938 }

00942 
00946 
00947 void RandomSearch::saveTrainingHistory(char* filename)
00948 
00949 {
00950    std::fstream file; 
00951 
00952    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00953 
00954    // Write file header 
00955 
00956    if(!file.is_open())
00957    {
00958       std::cerr << std::endl 
00959                 << "Flood Error: RandomSearch class." << std::endl
00960                 << "void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method." << std::endl
00961                 << "Cannot open training history data file." << std::endl
00962                 << std::endl;
00963 
00964       exit(1);
00965    }
00966    else
00967    {
00968       if(display)
00969       {
00970          std::cout << std::endl 
00971                    << "Saving training history to data file..." << std::endl;
00972       }
00973    }
00974 
00975    // Write file header
00976 
00977    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Random Search Training History." << std::endl;
00978 
00979    // Write file data
00980 
00981    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
00982    {
00983       file << "ElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl;
00984       file << elapsedTimeHistory << std::endl;      
00985    }
00986    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
00987    {
00988       file << "FreeParametersHistory:" << std::endl;
00989       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
00990    }
00991    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
00992    {
00993       file << "FreeParametersNormHistory:" << std::endl;
00994       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
00995    }
00996    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00997    {
00998       file << "EvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
00999       file << evaluationHistory << std::endl;      
01000    }
01001 
01002    file.close();     
01003      
01004 }
01005 
01006 
01007 }
